Comment: Destructive power of Kings gambit- DOUBLE BISHOP SACRIFICE- win on move 22. Learnt this most unpredictable of all gambits in April 2008, works on players of rating <1600 usually. Quiz- what wud u do on move 10 and 13?? See my 6 other annot games on KG- ALL EXCITING
pawn offered
